metadata.title: CVE-2016-4029 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: WordPress before 4.5 does not consider octal and hexadecimal IP address formats when determining an intranet address, which allows remote attackers to bypass an intended SSRF protection mechanism via a crafted address.

criterions.comment: wordpress package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.5+dfsg-1').
